00021 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_PARAMETERS_EXISTENCE_HPP
00022 #define CLPP_DETAIL_PARAMETERS_EXISTENCE_HPP
00023 
00024 #include "common_checker.hpp"
00025 #include "../parameter.hpp"
00026 #include "../parameter_parts_extractor.hpp"
00027 
00030 namespace clpp {
00031 
00034 namespace detail {
00035 
00036 typedef common_checker< parameters, parameter_parts_extractor, std::string > checker;
00037 
00042 class parameters_existence_checker : public checker {
00043 public:
00044     parameters_existence_checker( const parameters&                     registered_parameters
00045                                   , const parameter_parts_extractor&    extractor
00046                                   , const std::string&                  name_value_separator ) :
00047             checker( registered_parameters, extractor, name_value_separator ) {}
00048 public:
00049     void check( const str_storage& inputed_parameters ) const {
00050         if ( registered_parameters.empty() && !inputed_parameters.empty() ) {
00051             notify_about_parameters_absence();
00052         } else {} 
00053     }
00054 private:
00055     void notify_about_parameters_absence() const {
00056         const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() + "You inputs some parameter(s), but no one registered!";
00057         throw std::runtime_error( what_happened );
00058     }
00059 };
00060 
00061 } // namespace detail
00062 } // namespace clpp
00063 
00064 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_PARAMETERS_EXISTENCE_HPP
